org.openimaj.ml.clustering.kdtree

Interface SplitDetectionMode

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SplitDetectionMode.MEAN, SplitDetectionMode.MEDIAN, SplitDetectionMode.OPTIMISED, SplitDetectionMode.VARIABLE_MEDIAN

    public interface SplitDetectionMode
    Given a vector, tell me the split
    Author:
    Sina Samangooei (ss@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  SplitDetectionMode.MEAN
      Use the mean to split
      static class  SplitDetectionMode.MEDIAN
      Splits clusters becuase they don't have exactly the same value!
      static class  SplitDetectionMode.OPTIMISED
      minimise for y: (y' * (D - W) * y) / ( y' * D * y ); s.t.
      static class  SplitDetectionMode.VARIABLE_MEDIAN
      Find the median, attempt to find a value which keeps clusters together
